text:
Hi,
I'm working on a project for a company. Developing a platform to manage leads, deals, companies, and partners.
I want to build most of the project on HubSpot (Utilizing its capabilities as a CRM) and add an additional entity (that is missing right now).
Build a front-end interface for the partners. And sync everything using HubSpot API.
I'm looking for a company that I can work with to complete this task.

Thanks
